product_name: REI  Electrotab Electrolyte Replacement Tablets - Package of 10
long_description: An essential item for summertime first aid kits, the REI Electrotab Electrolyte Replacement Tablets help replace the essential chemicals the body loses to dehydration and heat exhaustion.
short_description: An essential item for summertime first aid kits, the REI Electrotab Electrolyte Replacement Tablets help replace the essential chemicals the body loses to dehydration and heat exhaustion.
